Title2: Bekhteff, save more and spend less
Description: With the economic conditions in which we live today, 'smart consumption' is a human matter and beneficial to all people, there are those who have things that are no longer valid for them or are more available than necessary, or even before the expiration date of their validity and wants to sell them, of course there are other people who desperately need them .
Description1: Here more than just an online  website
Description2: This site buys used goods that are in excellent condition and then sells them at greatly discounted prices. You can be sure that each item has been inspected before being put up for sale, that you will be getting exactly what has been described, and that the condition is guaranteed.
Description3: here buying and selling became easy for everyone
Description4: You don’t have to spend a lot of money to buy electronics, home furnishings, clothing, basic nouritures or other basic items you use every day. In fact, you can save a lot of money if you buy a lot of these items in previously-owned condition. You can get some great deals when you search through online want ads and find items being sold by people in your area, This free site is easy to use and you don’t need to use a credit card to sign up. You will find the best deals on items you want .
Subject: Subject
Description5: Each year, 1/3 of food produced in the world goes to waste, and it is responsible for 8% of all greenhouse gas emissions. We are on a mission to change that - are you with us ?
